statements: SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, subscription_plan FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan='Basic' ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL AND subscription_plan='Premium' ORDER BY customer_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT subscription_plan FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com' LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, subscription_plan FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%' AND subscription_plan IN ('Basic', 'Pro') ORDER BY subscription_plan DESC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE subscription_plan='Premium' AND (first_name='John' OR last_name='Doe') ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE first_name = 'John';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, service_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers
SELECT customer_id, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_id DESC
SELECT service_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, email FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium';
SELECT customer_id, name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM address WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT customer_id, name, email, start_date FROM customers INNER JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE subscription_type = 'Premium' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customers.name, address.city FROM customers INNER JOIN address ON customers.customer_id = address.customer_id WHERE address.state = 'California';

SELECT customers.name, subscriptions.subscription_type, address.street FROM customers INNER JOIN subscriptions ON customers.customer_id = subscriptions.customer_id INNER JOIN address ON customers.customer_id = address.customer_id WHERE subscriptions.start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, full_name FROM customers;
SELECT email_address, contact_number FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT service_name, price FROM services ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT full_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE contact_number LIKE '%-1234';
SELECT customer_id, full_name, city FROM customers JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE service_type = 'Internet' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT s.service_name, s.price, c.full_name FROM services s JOIN subscriptions sub ON s.service_name = sub.service_type JOIN customers c ON sub.customer_id = c.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_id, email FROM customers WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM subscriptions ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT plan_name, start_date, end_date FROM subscriptions WHERE customer_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM addresses WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY street_address DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriptions WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY plan_name;
SELECT payments.customer_id, payments.amount, customers.first_name, customers.last_name FROM payments JOIN customers ON payments.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
